original_text: You sat on an elegant couch, with a table spread before it on which you had placed the incense and olive oil that belonged to me.
korean_text: 화려한 자리에 앉아 앞에 상을 차리고 내 향과 기름을 그 위에 놓고

sentences.original_text: You sat on an elegant couch
with a table spread before it
on which you had placed the incense
and olive oil that belonged to me
